text: <@UJ2NQTCBC> Can you give a little more info about the types of entrepreneurs and their businesses?

<@UN3RHBFBK> - we asked for titles, but there wasn't a pattern.

Our goal was to survey B2B content marketers, in-house content marketers (agency or at a startup) and entrepreneurs.

We did this by asking two questions, "How do you earn a living?" and "How important is a blog to making you money?"

To answer our survey, they needed to answer the first question, "I have a job which requires me to work online" OR "I have a business OR website which makes money online."

For the second question, they needed to state a blog had low to very high importance.

Out of curiosity, why do you ask?

<@UJ2NQTCBC> Just helps to understand better how the info applies. For instance, it'd be interesting to know if these are largely companies  in a certain size range or in a handful of industries, or if they've got similar sales cycles, or if instead you're mostly the same responses regardless of these factors.
